post.body: Go work on niccarigg.com....no sleep
Hope you ready to work boi I'm I-59 bound.
You got a nice site man. I don't know who went the hardest yet. I think I'm just gonna plead da 5th.
Aye don't do nothin' crazy until I send dat track to u. Cuz that's the only killin goin on round here and dats me on da track
I feel u on that start up time but the playback shouldn't take dat long unless u got a lot of plugins in da session.
I'm probably gonna upgrade to dat pro-tools 8 soon. Heard they were making some good changes
I got a Jimmy HenneC semi-feature in one of my video future blogs. I'll shoot you da link
What fantatics looked like last night?
listening to the "Go Hard" remix wit Jigga on hiphopdx.com. If u think Jay fell off u crazy.
Listenin' to a player ass track. Its still hope for the beatmakers cause this is fye.
Damn I knew the custom myspace was tight but this custom twitter is goin' hard... Atleast it fit on my screen right.
Big KRIT,Boo, Lil T, Rob Gold.....next generation real MS shit. (alphabetical order)
eating some zaxby's. Its 80 degrees in da sip today. I love da south.
man i'm in da club rockin...until da dj said "it aint trickin if u got it"...A lie
Successful studio session. Got a nice track for the ladies that dont mind bein' number 2. Be lookin' for it.
....if u don't know what you doing in the booth please get out, get it together, and come back later
this is a good game
...smh at the chick actin a ass at shawty lo and gucci toy giveaway. Some folks are ungrateful
Merry Christmas from your good people over here in da sip Nicca Rigg Ent and the Hustle Hard Campaign. Any new gear??
...check out Nicca Rigg ent. Pla-Boi & DJ Chuck T mixtape on datpiff.com
